relevant_findings: Apgar scores 4/5 and 3/3 at 1 and 5 minutes after birth
Birthweights at the 10th percentile (2.416 Kg and 2.670 Kg)
Head circumferences at the 25th centile (32 cm and 33 cm)
Current neurologic examination characterized by progressive microcephaly and horizontal nystagmus
changes_over_time: Initial severe hypotonia with progressive deterioration
Microcephaly progression from 33 cm at birth to 42 cm at 4 years
Brain atrophy noticed by 3 months of age
